text: The Murcia Open is a professional tennis tournament played on clay courts. It is currently part of the Association of Tennis Professionals (ATP) Challenger Tour. It is held annually in Murcia, Spain since 2019. ==Past finals== ===Singles=== {|class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%" |- !Year !width="200"|Champion !width="200"|Runner-up !width="175"|Score |- | 2019 || Roberto Carballés Baena || Mikael Ymer || 2–6, 6–0, 6–2 |} ===Doubles=== {|class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%" |- !Year !width="200"|Champions !width="200"|Runners-up !width="175"|Score |- | 2019 || Marcus Daniell David Marrero || Rameez Junaid Andrei Vasilevski || 6–4, 6–4 |} ==References== Category:ATP Challenger Tour Category:Clay court tennis tournaments Category:Tennis tournaments in Spain Category:Murcia Category:Recurring sporting events established in 2019
title: Murcia Open
